content: 24 begin stuffing r12-13 10sc 7sc 7sc 2 rounds 24 r14 single_crochet decrease x3 decrease single_crochet decrease x2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease x2 16 we will be crocheting on the arms in the next rounds instructions underlined are when to crochet through the arm and body r15 3sc 4sc 5sc 4sc 16 r16 7sc 5sc 4sc 16 r17 increase x6 increase x8 incx2 32 stuff the neck r18 2sc increase x4 2sc increase x5 single_crochet single_crochet increase 2sc 42 r19 16sc 21sc 5sc 42 cut off the light blue now r20-25 single_crochet around 6 rounds 42 r26 5sc decrease x6 36 r27 4sc decrease x6 30 r28 3sc decrease x6 24 begin stufing the head r29 2sc decrease x6 18 r30 single_crochet decrease x6 12 r31 decrease x6 6 fo cut yarn leaving a few inches use a yarn needle to thread through the back loops of the remaining 6 stitches pull tight to close weave in the end assembly 10 ears sew three stitches down the side of the ear sew the base of the ear lined up with the last round of light blue and secure half way up the ear down to the head legs sitting sew on between rounds 4-9 of the body leaving about 5 stitches between them congratulations share your makes with me by tagging @crochetgrove
